EmailTemplate.name: Change of Address
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of Address
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dec 24th, 2009 “Freedom Wealth Solutions Pvt. Ltd”. 506/507, Morya Landmark II, Near Infinity Mall, Link Road, Andheri (W), Mumbai 400 053
Dear {!Vendor_del__c.Name} ,
This is to inform you that as of Dec 21st, 2009, Freedom Wealth Solutions Pvt. Ltd. has located to a new office. Our new address is 506/507, Morya Landmark II, Near Infinity Mall, Link Road, Andheri (W), Mumbai 400 053. The telephone number for our new location continues to remain the same.
In case of any questions regarding our new location and address, feel free to call us at 91 22 42224333.
Best Regards,
Freedom Wealth Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
